data.message: No I do not want to use the new messenger.  Too many privacy issues.   Please give us a better choice?

replies.message: We understand your concerns, Rebecca. Almost all apps must ask for permissions to run. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about how Messenger actually uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/1xYr0PZ -Chantal
No I still don't want itm

Messenger is required because it meets all the requirements for FASCISTbook to share your private information with the government agencies without FB having to do any extra work to supply that information.Use FB through a browser to see your messages
Just use your phones web browser then if you don't want the apps.
thats how I do it just use the browser once they block that I will block facebook  I dont like everybody having my info
Yes I am using my mobile website to sent my message I can't fathom how Facebook could stop that but if they did I would drop Facebook immediately.
Your trust is there concern yeahrite
Messenger will allow big brother know everything you post
